data.text:
This is a list of LGBT movies that I know of, or have seen. The title links lead to each movie’s Wikipedia page, unless no such page is available. Premise provided by IMDB.

The lists of triggers are not complete and are based solely on my memories of the films. Please send me an ask if you would like to add to this list, or add to a list of triggers for a specific movie.

Lesbian:

Aimee and Jaguar

April’s Shower

Better Than Chocolate

Blue Is The Warmest Colour

But I’m a Cheerleader

Language: English

Year: 1999

Triggers: Conversion Therapy (albeit mostly unsuccessful)

Length: 85 minutes (US release) 92 minutes (UK release)

(I personally recommend the UK release)

Premise: A naive teenager is sent to rehab camp when her straitlaced parents and friends suspect her of being a lesbian.

Happy Ending: Yes

Notes: This is my favorite movie, and has a great indie soundtrack

Polyamorous/Multiple:

French Twist (Gazon Maudit)

Language: French

Year: 1995

Triggers: Pregnancy, infidelity

Length: 104 minutes

Premise: After learning of her husband’s infidelities, a housewife invites an itinerant lesbian to move in with them. None of their lives will ever be the same again.

Happy Ending: Yes

Notes:

Love Songs (Les Chansons d'amour)

Transgender:

Boys Don’t Cry

The Danish Girl

Transamerica
